mapper.select: select mem.M_ID, mem.M_NAME, rou.R_NUM from member mem join bus bu on mem.B_VEHICLENUM = bu.B_VEHICLENUM join route rou on rou.R_NUM = bu.R_NUM where mem.M_ID not in (select m_id from reguloff) and rou.r_num = #{r_num}
select rou.r_num, rou.G_NUM, gar.G_NAME from route rou join garage gar on gar.g_num = rou.g_num where rou.g_num = #{g_num}
select g_num, g_name, g_x, g_y, g_addr, g_space, g_currentpark from garage

select r.ko_code, r.m_id, r.o_code, r.ro_code, r.ro_reqdate, r.ro_regdate, r.ro_object,
k.ko_name, o.o_date as bd, mo.o_date as ad, m.m_name as bn, me.m_name as an
from reguloffr r join member m on r.m_id=m.m_id join koff k on r.ko_code=k.ko_code join moff o on r.o_code=o.o_code join moff mo on r.ro_code=mo.o_code join member me on r.ro_object=me.m_id
mapper.update: update reguloffr set ko_code='601', o_check='Y', ro_regdate=sysdate where m_id=#{m_id} and ro_object=#{ro_object}
mapper.select: select distinct m.m_name, b.r_num, m.b_vehiclenum, o.o_date from member m join bus b on m.b_vehiclenum=b.b_vehiclenum join oschedule o on m.b_vehiclenum=o.b_vehiclenum
select o_time from oschedule where o_date=#{o_date} and b_vehiclenum=#{b_vehiclenum}

select rego.M_ID, mem.m_name, mo.O_DATE, mo.o_code from member mem join reguloff rego on rego.M_ID = mem.M_ID join moff mo on mo.O_CODE = rego.O_CODE join bus bu on mem.B_VEHICLENUM = bu.B_VEHICLENUM join route rou on rou.R_NUM = bu.R_NUM where rou.r_num = #{r_num}
select o_code from moff where o_date = #{o_date}
mapper.insert: insert into reguloff(m_id, o_code, ro_regdate) values(#{param1},#{param2},sysdate)
mapper.update: update reguloff set o_code = #{param2} where m_id = #{param1}
mapper.select: select mem.m_id, mem.m_name, reg.o_code,bus.r_num from member mem join reguloff reg on mem.m_id=reg.m_id join bus bus on bus.b_vehiclenum=mem.b_vehiclenum where bus.r_num = #{r_num}
select count(*) from reguloffr where ko_code='600' and o_check='Y'
select count(*) from reguloffr where ko_code='602' and o_check='Y'

select ko.KO_NAME, rego.M_ID,mem.M_NAME, mo.O_DATE, mo1.O_DATE, rego.RO_REQDATE , rego.RO_REGDATE,mem1.M_ID, mem1.M_NAME,bu.R_NUM from reguloffr rego join member mem on mem.m_id = rego.m_id join bus bu on bu.B_VEHICLENUM = mem.B_VEHICLENUM join member mem1 on mem1.m_id = rego.ro_object join koff ko on ko.ko_code = rego.ko_code join moff mo on mo.o_code = rego.o_code join moff mo1 on mo1.o_code = rego.ro_code where ko.ko_code = '600' and rego.o_check='Y'

select bu.R_NUM, mem.M_NAME, rego.M_ID, mo.O_DATE, rego.o_code, rego.TEMP from member mem join bus bu on mem.b_vehiclenum = bu.b_vehiclenum join reguloff rego on mem.m_id = rego.m_id join moff mo on mo.O_CODE = rego.O_CODE where bu.r_num = #{r_num}

select ko.KO_NAME, rego.M_ID,mem.M_NAME, mo.O_DATE,mo.O_CODE, mo1.O_DATE as o_date_1, mo1.O_CODE as o_code_1, rego.RO_REQDATE , rego.RO_REGDATE,mem1.M_ID as m_id_1, mem1.M_NAME as m_name_1,bu.R_NUM from reguloffr rego join member mem on mem.m_id = rego.m_id join bus bu on bu.B_VEHICLENUM = mem.B_VEHICLENUM join member mem1 on mem1.m_id = rego.ro_object join koff ko on ko.ko_code = rego.ko_code join moff mo on mo.o_code = rego.o_code join moff mo1 on mo1.o_code = rego.ro_code where rego.M_ID in (select mem.M_ID from member mem join bus bu on bu.B_VEHICLENUM = mem.B_VEHICLENUM join reguloff reg on reg.M_ID = mem.M_ID where reg.TEMP = 'true' and bu.R_NUM = #{r_num}) and ko.ko_code = '600' and rego.o_check='Y'
mapper.update: update reguloff set o_code = #{param2}, ro_regdate = sysdate, temp = null where m_id = #{param1}
update reguloffr set ko_code = '601', ro_regdate = sysdate where m_id = #{m_id} and ko_code = '600'
update reguloffr set ko_code = '602' where m_id = #{m_id} and ko_code = '600'
